enum: From 2010 – 2017, States Parties used the IHR monitoring questionnaire. The report is available in the e-SPAR platform (https://extranet.who.int/e-spar/ ).

In 2021, the SPAR tool was revised and further improved, taking account of the initial experience of countries with the COVID-19 pandemic. The second edition of SPAR (2021) contains 15 capacities and 35 indicators compared to 13 capacities and 24 indicators in the first edition.

title: International Health Regulations (IHR) capacity and health emergency preparedness
